description:
This PowerPoint 2010 course will enable you to create great presentations that will wow your boss!

Learn everything from how to start the program to how to view the finished slide show.

The course is structured in easy to follow sections and you can choose whether to follow each lesson in the order given, or whether you want to jump in and learn a particular skill.

The course has exercises to help you practice and quizzes to check your understanding.

You will be creating fabulous PowerPoint Presentations in no time.
title: Learn PowerPoint 2010
